hi and welcome you're listening to the
x22 report my name is Dave and this is

11th 2017 and the top of the episode is
the economic reset has been planned and
the bankers want to control it now
before I get started I just want to make
an announcement I uploaded an interview
with Andrew Hoffman it is on the x-22
report spot like YouTube channel so all
you need to do is go over to YouTube
type in X 20 to report spotlight it will
bring you right to the video or you can

comm site the news sentinel comm site
all you need to do is scroll down a

and you can play the video right on the

steaming ste e MIT comm /at X 20 to
report and it will bring you right over
the video and you can watch it on steam
it let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now we've been covering
each and every economic indicator and
we've been following them and we've been
noticing over a period of time that
these economic indicators they've
declined they're getting worse and worse
and worse as time goes on and what
everyone needs to realize and understand
and people of course saying you know
when is the economy going to come down
when is it going to implode why is it
taking so long well you have to remember
the central bank the US government
working together they needed to create
something they needed to build something
and what do they build they built an
economy built on an illusion now of
course they're making it seem like this
economy is the real economy and people
have jobs retail is fine this is just an
anomaly GDP numbers look great
everything's normalizing these are the
words that they use and everything's
going to be okay and it takes a long
time to create an illusion actually
takes a long time to build anything
think about it if you wanted to build a
skyscraper it takes quite a while it's
got to get the permits got to get
everything into place gotta get the
materials
and then you can start building and it
takes time to complete the entire
building but let's say you wanted to
bring the building down how long does
that take it doesn't take long at all a
lot less time to set the charges and to
demolish the building compared to how
long it took to actually build that
structure it's the same thing with the
economy to build this illusion to make
you believe that the economy is doing
well to create these bubbles like we've
never seen before and to keep it alive
they needed to manipulate they needed to
push stimulus they needed to do things
they've never done before and the only
way they were able to do this is because
of the laws that were passed in 2008 and
we also have additional laws where it
allows them to bail in instead of
getting bailed out now remember all of
this was planned from the beginning
because they knew that this system would
only last a certain period of time it's
like when we came off the gold standard
in 1971 you think they just woke up one
day say hey you know something
we should come off the gold standard no
it was planned they probably wanted to
do this much much earlier in time but it
just so happened to end up during that
period and they created this whole plan
to come off the gold standard I move on
to the petrodollar
and then we went through a transition
period well this next reset this next
transition this has been planned for
quite a while and they needed to get
everything in place to make sure that
they're able to do this because their
entire goal is to continually keep
control of the economy they want to
start the system over and they want to
have total control of the system this is
why people are talking about the SDR
this is why people are talking about
all different things now many people
would like the cryptocurrency where it's
completely decentralized and the central
bank has no hands in the till here now a
lot of people would like that that would
be fantastic it'd be great if we got rid
of the central banks now remember the
central banks they don't want to
disappear they want to be in control now
they've planned on having an SDR for
quite a while now remember this is going
way way back and this would sit on top
of everything else where the
government's corporations would deal in
the SDR and the rest of the countries
for the everyday person living they
would use a different currency now a lot

works the central bankers this is their
plan doesn't mean it's going to work but
this is what they've been planning on
using now people say well what about

go digital well this is still in their
plans now cryptocurrency is quite do the
blockchain technology is quite new but
they might use it not in the way that we
would like to be used not the way we
want it to be used but in the way that
they want to use it remember they want
control of this system so they might use
this as the digital currency where it's
local to each country and the SDR that
is used for governments corporations to
trade around the world now this wouldn't
be used by everyday people and this is
why when you hear the word like
one-world currency and things like that
this is most likely what they're talking
about now they would like this to happen
they would like something like this or
maybe there's gonna be a variation of
this but their whole entire agenda which
has been planned from the very beginning
is to create an instance where they can
control all of it and you can see this
is what they're trying to do right now
they're trying to push this agenda still
will they succeed well I think if the
people around the world and there's been
protests around the world against the
central banking system and we can see
with the TTIP the TPP we can see that
people fought back and said you know
something we do not want this well the
same thing would have to happen with the
central bank's people would have to
fight back and protest and say we do not
want a central bank this would be the
best thing for the people we don't need
them there's no benefit to the people
the only benefit is to them but we can
see right now that this has been planned
and they are at their last stage of
bringing down the system and this is why
we're seeing everything completely

we look at many of the economic
indicators we can see that things are
rapidly falling apart I mean when we
look at automotive when we look at
housing the GP numbers when we look at

together now they understand as they
know this Trump actually knows that this
is happening remember before he became
president he said there's bubbles all
over the place after he was inaugurated
he said the economy's a complete mess so
he understands that this is happening
right now and he's also dealt with
bankruptcy he's also dealt with
restructuring
he's also dealt with everything that is
happening right now in this country and
around the world and again we've never
seen stimulus like this before we've
never seen QE until right now have we've
never seen an unwinding of a Fed balance
sheet at the same time they are raising
interest rates so all of this is
happening at the same exact time and we
know what happens when rates move up we
understand that it affects many
industries it affects the mortgage
industry it affects the automobile
industry it affects the banking industry
it affects many many different things
and a lot of these things are going to
crash and they've been planning for this
crash and these central bankers they
don't care if the crash is hard if it's
soft it makes no difference to them on
how this happens all they want is to
control the narrative they want to make
sure they are the ones telling everyone
what comes next
now of course it's going to look like
they're just there to help and they're
just there to fix the problems because
the government is asking them but this
has been planned from the beginning and
it seems that we're at the final stage
right now because when we look at
everything with flattening or inverted

implosion when we look at the GDP
numbers when we look at there's no

we see there's debt that cannot be

declining well we have a major problem
here and this problem is not just going
to go away and remember to build a
building it could take years for a
building to come down it takes one day
not even a day a couple of hours that's
how quickly this system can come down
and this is what we're going to see
we're going to see the system come down
because they needed to look horrific
so they can do the next step think about
what happened in 2008 when the system
was coming down I mean there was a lot
of fear-mongering there saying we better

apart and of course the Fed came in and
said we will start stimulus and don't
worry there'll only be one QE then there

started manipulating all the numbers I

control of the real estate market gain

other central banks and countries around

and we will start seeing this transition
and this transition is going to be
transitioning away from the dollar
because they understand and we can see

petro dollar system this system is

it will be a new system there will be a
new system in place and the dollar
well that will no longer exist now they
might call the next currency something

dollar might be something else a

create something in this country to be
used locally and what that means is that
the value of the dollar is going to have

that is in your pension plans the
currency that is in this stock market
all this paper stuff that's going on
right now well it's all going to be

I mean look what happened in Cyprus they
lock down the banks people didn't really
riot they said we're taking your

were like they were they went through

when they said if you know we need your

they're going to create this entire
narrative
to make you feel guilty that you're not

work because they're going to make it
seem like if you don't sacrifice if you
don't do this well you're not a true

you're not a true Australian they're

you know with the economy deteriorating

everyone doesn't experience everything

everyone was dragged into this in the

well we're at the end of this system now
